category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Mfg0MEStudy_ColumnWidthPreferences
preference.preference_description: Specifies the widths for the columns defined in the Mfg0MEStudy_ColumnPreferences preference.This is an internal preference and should be modified automatically by Teamcenter only. Valid Values: Accepts positive integers. The number of values should be the same as the number of values in the Mfg0MEStudy_ColumnPreferences preference.
